title: Geri Horner wants Cheryl to date older men after failed romances
text:
Maybe older men won’t sing sultry songs with other singers (Picture: MEGA/SplashNews.com)

Geri Horner has been encouraging Cheryl to date someone older after her failed romance with Liam Payne.

The former Spice Girl wants to help her pal Cheryl find love and she believes it will come in the form of a more mature man.

‘Geri was giving Cheryl some dating advice amid her spate of failed romances, encouraging her to look at dating someone older,’ an inside source told New.

‘Cheryl really looks up to Geri and values her advice, especially given that their careers have mirrored each other’s so much. Seeing how happy Geri is in her personal life has given Cheryl hope.’

It’s no surprise that the singer – who shares a two-year-old son with Liam – would look up to Geri considering she gave Cheryl her break into showbiz by picking her to be in Girls Aloud on Popstars: The Rivals.

The insider continued: ‘Geri has offered to set Cheryl up with a friend of Christian’s, which Cheryl said she’d be open to.

‘Geri said she’d be in touch back in the UK and invited her and Bear to come over for dinner, even suggesting it would be good to meet her potential match in an informal setting on a more casual scale.’

It was claimed that Liam was the only man who stayed faithful to Cheryl (Picture: Karwai Tang/WireImage)

The Fight For This Love singer broke up with Liam 16 months after giving birth to son Bear and many believe it may be due to Liam’s steamy duet with Rita Ora.

For You was released for the 50 Shades Of Grey soundtrack so of course they had to get close and personal when they sung it.

The two appeared at the L’Oreal fashion show at Paris Fashion Week (Picture: MEGA)

Speaking to Closer, the 26-year-old former One Direction singer said: ‘[My duet with Rita] didn’t do very much for my personal life. But it did a lot for… yeah no, it was good.’

The duet came out in January 2018, several months before Liam and Cheryl – who share two-year-old son Bear together – split in July.

A month after the couple split Liam and Rita were seen getting close at a party which fuelled rumours of a romance.

However, Rita has yet to publically confirm or deny whether the two ever had somewhat of a romance while Cheryl and Liam were still together.

Metro.co.uk have contacted reps for comment.
